description: This file defines the ToDoService class, which acts as the service layer handling business logic for ToDo items within a Spring-based backend application. It provides methods for creating, reading, updating, listing, and deleting ToDo entities, interacting with a repository for persistence.

classes.name: ToDoService
classes.description: Service layer encapsulating ToDo business logic for CRUD operations in a Spring application.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new ToDo item from a ToDoRequest.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists all ToDo items, optionally filtered by completion status.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a ToDo item by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing ToDo item by ID with provided non-null fields from the request.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a ToDo item by ID.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a ToDo entity into a ToDoResponse DTO.
